Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays near Grand due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays near Grand due to police activity.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Reroute at 71st/Richmond
ShortDescription: 67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, California, Marquette, Kedzie and 71st : due to, street blockage near 71st/Richmond.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 71st, California, Marquette, Kedzie, 71st and over regular route, due to street blockage near 71st/Richmond.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark, #24 Wentworth, #36 Broadway, #62 Archer Temporary Northbound Reroute near Dearborn/Washington
ShortDescription: 22 Clark, 24 Wentworth, 36 Broadway, and 62 Archer buses are temporarily near Dearborn/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark, #24 Wentworth, #36 Broadway and #62 Archer buses are temporarily near Dearborn/Washington. 

Northbound Buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, State, Randolph, and Dearborn including the normal route streets, due to street blockage near Dearborn/Washington

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted Northbound near Dearborn/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted near Dearborn/Washington. 

Northbound buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, State, and Washington, due to street blockage near Dearborn/Washington.

Southbound  buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove,  #X4 Cottage Grove Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/35th
ShortDescription: Southbound 4 Cottage Grove,  X4 Cottage Grove Express buses are temporarily near Cottage Grove/35th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #4 Cottage Grove, #X4 Cottage Grove Express buses are temporarily near Cottage Grove/35th.

Southbound buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Indiana, 33rd Blvd., King Drive, 33rd Place, Rhodes, 35th and Cottage Grove including the normal route streets , due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/35th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/35th
ShortDescription: Eastbound 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted near Cottage Grove/35th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted near Cottage Grove/35th.

Eastbound  buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Indiana, 33rd Blvd, King Drive, 33rd Place, Rhodes and 35th including the normal route streets due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/35th.
